links.title: Tesla's Musk buying over half of SolarCity bond offer - filing

links.title: Peak Pokémon; Apple iPhone Pro?; Tesla's Surprise Announcement -- Eye On Tech
links.description: According to reports, Pokémon Go ( OTCPK:NTDOY) has peaked in terms of usage. That seems to confirm the early intel reports I received from family members this week, although that's an unofficial tally at best. The new data shows a decline in engagement rates, as well as a drop in worldwide daily active users.

links.title: Pokemon Go - Who is making money from this Nintendo game?

links.title: Tesla to unveil new product Tuesday, shares rise
links.description: (Reuters) - Tesla Motors Inc (TSLA.O) chief executive Elon Musk said on Tuesday that the company planned to make a product announcement later in the day, sending the company's share price higher. "Tesla product announcement at noon California time today," Musk tweeted. The company declined to offer details before the announcement.

links.title: Tesla Says Model S Now Quickest Production Car In World
links.description: Tesla Motors ( TSLA) introduced new versions of its Model S and X that boosts speeds and driving range, with updated battery technology. Tesla plans to begin selling its Model S sedan and Model X SUV with a new 100 kilowatt-hour battery that will enable faster speed and greater range, letting them operate in the company's so-called "Ludicrous" high-speed mode.
